events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on the morning of February 9th involving their sedan and another car at an intersection.
Claim has been reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident based on the details of the car collision described by the claimant.
An insurance claims agent was assigned to handle the case involving the customer's vehicle collision and follow up on next steps.
The claim has been formally acknowledged and confirmation sent to the customer, ensuring them that processing will begin shortly.
Request sent to customer asking for police report, photos of vehicle damage, and any medical reports for injuries sustained in the accident.
Customer provided all requested documents including police report, multiple photographs of the damaged car, and medical notes.
Claims team initiated investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle collision, reviewing submitted evidence and contacting witnesses.
Investigation concluded with comprehensive analysis of accident details, confirming liability and verifying authenticity of documents.
A settlement offer was created and sent to the customer proposing coverage for repair costs and medical expenses related to the collision.
Customer responded positively to the settlement offer expressing satisfaction with the compensation and service provided so far.
Claim approved officially by the insurance company to proceed with the settlement payment and repair arrangements.
Payment was processed and issued to customer’s account to cover the agreed settlement amount for vehicle damages and medical bills.
The insurance claim case has been successfully closed following the settlement payment and final confirmation from the customer.
All claim documents and records were archived into the company’s database for future reference and auditing purposes.
